00022     
00023  public:
00024     
00025     Histogram(int,double,double, std::string);

00034     double minValue();

00069 inline void
00070 Histogram::increment(double x) {
00071     
00072     if (x>maxValue())      _overflow++;
00073     else if (x<minValue()) _underflow++;
00074     else {
00075         
00076         gsl_histogram_increment( _hist, x );
00077 
00078     }
00079 }
00080 
00085 inline void
00086 Histogram::accumulate(double x, double weight) {
00087     if (x>maxValue())      _overflow++;
00088     else if (x<minValue()) _underflow++;
00089     else {
00090       gsl_histogram_accumulate( _hist, x, weight );
00091     }
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00098 inline double
00099 Histogram::operator[](int i) {
00100     return gsl_histogram_get( _hist, i );
00101 }
00102 
00107 inline double
00108 Histogram::get(int i) {
00109     return gsl_histogram_get( _hist, i );
00110 }
